products.name: Burger
products.description: Four 100% Irish beef patties, a slice of cheese, lettuce, onion and pickles. And the sauce, the special Mood For Food mayo. Burger comes with chips.

products.name: Cheeseburger
products.description: Four 100% Irish beef patties, a slice of cheese, lettuce, onion and pickles. And the sauce, the special Mood For Food mayo. Burger comes with chips.

products.name: Quarter Pounder
products.description: A quarter-pound patty of 100% Irish beef, with two slices of cheese, onions, pickles, mustard and a dollop of tomato ketchup in a sesame seed bun. Irresistible. Burger comes with chips.

products.name: Monster
products.description: Four 100% Irish beef patties, a slice of cheese, lettuce, onion and pickles. And the sauce, the special Mood For Food mayo. Burger comes with chips.
